package.name: iop_builder_fkie
package.description:
JAUS build helper. It generates CPP sources from JSIDL files. An installed JausToolSet is required. Install instructions: Does not work with java 8! 1. Download the sources from http://jaustoolset.org/ 2. goto jaustoolset/GUI/ 3. # ant bindmxGraph 4. # ant bindJSIDLPlus 5. # ant bind 6. # ant compile-promela 7. # ant compile 8. # ant schema-export 9. export JTS_COMMON_PATH=/home/XXX/jaustoolset-2.2.1/GUI/templates/Common Ready.
If you need jaus nodeManager, goto nodeManger, then run 'scons'. If some error occurs regarding missing "pthread" and "timer" the libpthread and librt have to be included.
This can be done by replacing LIBS=[] by LIBS=['-lpthread', '-lrt'] in GUI/templates/Common/SConstruct
